    denorm_present       = 1
};

Enumeration constants of type {{lc|std::float_denorm_style}} indicate support of subnormal values by floating-point types.

===Enumeration constants===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem | Name | Definition}}
{{dsc | {{lc|std::denorm_indeterminate}} | Support of subnormal values cannot be determined }}
{{dsc | {{lc|std::denorm_absent}}        | The type does not support subnormal values}}
{{dsc | {{lc|std::denorm_present}}       | The type allows subnormal values}}
{{dsc end}}
